abstract: Shareholders, angered by lofty executive pay in a time of dwindling earnings, turned their wrath on Royal Dutch Shell on Tuesday, voting against compensation packages for senior management.
snippet: Shareholders, angered by lofty executive pay in a time of dwindling earnings, turned their wrath on Royal Dutch Shell on Tuesday, voting against compensation packages for senior management.
lead_paragraph: Shareholders, angered by lofty executive pay in a time of dwindling earnings, turned their wrath on Royal Dutch Shell on Tuesday, voting against compensation packages for senior management, The New York Times’s Julia Werdigier reports from London.

headline.main: Shell Shareholders Vote Against Executive Pay Plan

abstract: Shareholders of Royal Dutch Shell protested against bonuses for its senior executives by voting against such compensation in a nonbinding resolution.
snippet: Shareholders of Royal Dutch Shell protested against bonuses for its senior executives by voting against such compensation in a nonbinding resolution.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  Shareholders, angered by lofty executive pay at a time of dwindling earnings, turned their wrath on Royal Dutch Shell on Tuesday, voting against compensation packages for senior managers.

headline.main: Shareholders Reject Pay Package for Shell Executives
headline.print_headline: Shareholders Reject Pay Package for Shell Executives
